This server has a dynamic drop system
Every monster drops absolutely everything based on their level
This way you can expect resources, recipes, parts and even whole items to be dropped regularly from any monster in the world

To view what monster has to drop Shift+Click on it and click the 'Drop' button

Every item that is dropped from monsters or raid bosses has a chance to be randomly enchanted from +1 to +16
Because of this system, spoil is disabled on this server

Best of drop to you!
